_header: In the land of life I hope to see
_description: A single couplet in a Latin homily

OxfBal149.Transcription:
In Þe londe of liue Y hop to seIoy & blisse þat euer
                    schal be

OxfMagd93.Transcription:
In the londe of lyf y hope to seioie and blis that euer shalle
                    bee

CULKk424.Transcription:
In þe lond of lyfe y hope to seþe ioye & blysse
                    þat euer schal be
CULKk424.Note:
In a sermon (Amore langueo) for dominica in passione vel in
                        die parasceue, possibly by John Bromyard.

TCD277.Transcription:
In land of lyf I trow to seioy & blys þat euer sall
                    be
TCD277.Note:
In a sermon (Amore langueo) for dominica in passione vel in
                        die parasceue, possibly by John Bromyard.
